description.de:
Nachdem er 12 Jahre lang in einem Turm voller sich regenerierender Monster gefangen war, ist Hyeonu Kim mächtiger als so ziemlich jeder Mensch und jedes Monster auf der Erde. Endlich frei, ist er entschlossen, herauszufinden, wer hinter seiner Gefangenschaft steckt. Auch wenn das bedeutet, dass er Horden von Monstern töten muss - und dabei ganz nebenbei die Welt rettet.

description.en:
After being trapped for 12 years in a tower full of regenerating monsters, Hyeonu Kim is more powerful than just about any human or monster on Earth. Now that he’s free, he’s determined to find out who was behind his imprisonment, even if that means he has to kill hordes of monsters -- and inadvertently save the world -- along the way.

ある日、世界中に突如として出現したモンスターと塔。強制的にその塔に連れていかれた人々が塔から脱出するためにはあらゆる試練をクリアするしかない。生き残った生存者は特殊能力を持ったハンターとなり人類のヒーローになるのだ。 12年間チュートリアル塔に閉じ込められていた「佐藤健太郎」。塔の無限の呪いにかかった彼は1349回クリアを繰り返し強力なハンターへと成長していた。そんなある日、彼の呪いは解け塔からの脱出に成功するのだが…！ 気分爽快、ぶっ飛びヒーローの登場！！

description.en: A short story collection project by Ariga Hitoshi that was prepared some time after the release of *Rockman Gigamix* but shelved for various reasons.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order - Daily Chaldea (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Hotaru no Yomeiri

altTitles.ja: ホタルの嫁入り

description.en: A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!
description.es:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.ja:
令嬢と殺し屋…絶対交わらないはずの二人の、契約結婚ラブサスペンス！
時は明治。
名家に生まれ美貌に恵まれるも、余命わずかと言われている紗都子の唯一の夢は…家の利益になる結婚をすること。
しかし突然、謎の殺し屋に命を狙われ…！？
その場を生き延びるため、紗都子は殺し屋にある“提案”を…！？
description.uk: "Весілля світлячків" – манґа, події якої розгортаються у давні часи епохи Мейджі. Дівчина на ім'я Сатоко, донька заможної родини, якій пощастило успадкувати красу, прагне одружитися з тим, кого запропонує їй батько, але як же це зробити, якщо її життю загрожує хвороба? Одного дня героїня потрапляє до рук викрадачів, де, задля порятунку себе, вона пропонує шлюб власному вбивці. Куди її приведе узгоджений шлюб з людиною, яку вона ніколи не мала зустріти?
description.es-la:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de romance ambientada na era Meiji.  

Nascida em uma família de prestígio e abençoada com boa aparência, Satoko tem uma expectativa de vida curta. Mas de repente, sua vida é alvo de um misterioso assassino...?! Para sobreviver no local, Satoko faz uma "proposta" para o assassino...?! 
- Uma jovem e um assassino... 

Um suspense de amor por contrato de casamento entre duas pessoas que nunca deveriam se encontrar!
description.zh-hk:
千金小姐與殺手…絕對沒有交集的兩個人間的契約結婚愛情喜劇！
時值明治時代。
出生名門又集美貌於一身，卻被告知餘命不久矣的紗都子唯一的夢想是…為了家族的利益而結婚。
但是，突然之間被謎樣的殺手給襲擊了…！？
為了從這種局面中活下來，紗都子向殺手提出了某項“提案”…！？

description.en:
Alexandra is the duchess of the Kingdom of Tarraconensis. It was only the day before the absolution event that she realized that she was the villainous daughter of an otome game! It's clear that she'll be denounced and her engagement will be broken tomorrow.
But I don't want to be condemned honestly! I'd rather show my eyes to the people who despised me! With only 24 hours left, Alexandra begins to make a breakthrough in her desperate situation.
description.id:
Alexandra adalah putri seorang duke dari Kerajaan Tarraconensis. 
Ketika dia telah sadar jika dia adalah seorang villaness dari sebuah otome game, waktu yang tersisa sebelum acara pembatalan pertunangan hanya tersisa satu hari saja!
Sudah dipastikan bahwa saat itu akan diumumkan pembatalan pertunangannya!
Tapi dia tidak ingin hanya menerima pembatalan itu! melainkan dia ingin melakukan perlawanan kepada orang-orang yang membencinya!
Hanya tersisa 24 jam saja, alexandra memulai langkahnya untuk bisa keluar dari situasi keputus-asaan ini.
description.pt-br: Alexandra é a duquesa do Reino de Tarraconensis. Foi somente no dia anterior ao evento de absolvição que ela percebeu que era a filha vilã de um jogo otome! É claro que ela será denunciada e seu noivado será rompido amanhã. Mas eu não quero ser condenada, honestamente! Prefiro mostrar do que eu fui feita para as pessoas que me desprezaram! Faltando apenas 24 horas, Alexandra começa a fazer um avanço em sua situação desesperadora.

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

description.en:
A "dragon" appears from a container that fell in front of Dazai Ryunosuke's eyes.

The disastrously beautiful "dragon", Rinne Irako, had been condemned to death as a world-destroying calamity, and was being transported to a place of refuge.

Rinne Irako was sentenced to death and transported. But as fate would have it, the "dragon" girl had a miraculous encounter with a boy, and her destiny was about to change drastically.

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!

title.en: The 100th Regression of the Max-Level Player

altTitles.es-la: La regresión 100 del jugador de nivel máximo

description.en:
Earth ends up in a worldwide death game where everyone from the ages of 15 to 29 must participate.

In this 20-round death game, Ryu Min stands alone at the entrance of the last round. However, the game taunts him, killing him for having not met the entry requirement of a minimum 5-man party.

Now, on his 100th and final attempt, he uses the information he learned from his previous 99 attempts to help raise the necessary companions to reach the end. Can Ryu Min finally beat the game, or will he perish in his attempt?
description.ko: 전세계적으로 15세부터 25세는 무조건 참가해야 하는 총 20라운드의 데스게임. 이 게임에 회귀특성으로 100번째 도전을 시작하게 된 주인공이 99번의 경험으로 얻은 정보를 이용해 남들보다 압도적으로 강해지는 사이다물. 마지막 라운드의 조건이 최소 5명인 걸 깨닫고, 실패를 반복하지 않기 위해 필요한 인원들을 자신이 키우는 먼치킨 성장 스토리.

description.en:
First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-1-phantom-blood/all)

title.en: Osu!! Karate Club

altTitles.ja: 押忍！！空手部

altTitles.ja-ro: Osu!! Karate Bu

description.en:
The series began as a fairly humorous and lighthearted satire of Japan's teenage delinquent-gang subculture told from the perspective of Matsushita Tadashi (who also narrates these early Karate Bu stories), a 2nd year student at Kangokou High and a constant target of Kangokou's numerous bullies who beat him up routinely after school. He is almost always accompanied by his best friend Saitou Takaki, who is also constantly harassed.  
  
As the pair grow increasingly tired of being victimized they decide to join the titular Karate Club, which is notorious throughout Osaka's youth gangs for training and producing the city's most hardened and toughest teenage thugs while maintaining the facade of a legit school sports club. But when they join the club, they find themselves picked on just as much if not worse by the club's current members. But as the story progresses they grow to be increasingly capable fighters.  
  
Along with the manga's change in attitude and central character, the various teenage fighters throughout the series grew increasingly stronger and even began to tap into superhuman ki abilities, putting Osu!! Karate Bu in the company of other similar epic Shōnen fighting manga such as Yu Yu Hakusho, Dragon Ball, and Fist of the North Star.  
  
Osu!! Karate Bu was wildly popular in its native Japan, but is otherwise almost completely unknown in most other countries. It spawned a four episode OVA mini-series released over a period of two years from 1990-1992, a 1990 live action movie, and a 1994 Super Famicom fighting game.

description.en: Following a disastrous encounter with a noble, Myne finally resolves to say goodbye to her family and friends in the lower city, changing her name to “Rozemyne” and beginning her new life as the adopted daughter of Ehrenfest’s archduke. However, her days as an archnoble in noble society are brutal, as she is put through rigorous etiquette and magic training on top of her duties as High Bishop and forewoman. It all proves too much for a weak little seven-year-old girl… Or it would have, had the High Priest not offered her the keys to the temple’s book room as a reward. If she could get her hands on those, she’d be able to read all sorts of precious books! Her name may have changed, but Rozemyne’s passion for books remains the same as she charges into a whole new world! The detailed setting expands as the printing industry grows in size. Here begins Part 3 of this biblio-fantasy for book lovers everywhere!

title.en: Hybrid

description.en:
the Grand Hybrid, born from the union of angels and demons, is believed to possess the highest lineage among hybrids. When awakened, this extraordinary being, known as the ‘Apex Hybrid’, is said to have the power to blow up the universe.

Contrary to Jake’s desire for a simple and ordinary life, angels and devils eventually seek him out as the ultimate ‘Apex Hybrid’. They employ various strategies to convince him to join their respective sides.

title.en: God's Web Novel

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I thought it was going to be the common cliché of 'Transmigrating into a webnovel's world as the main character', but this story hadn't been written. The life of the main character Lee Hwan, the setting, the other characters. None of it!

God—the author—told me, "My style of writing webnovels is going to be very different from how your people do it."

Wait a second! This is way too different!!!
description.pt-br:
Quando abri meus olhos, pensei que estava em mais um clichê de “Transmigrar para o mundo de uma webnovel sendo o protagonista”, mas essa história não foi escrita. A vida do protagonista Lee Hwan, todo o roteiro, história e outros personagens não foram escritos, absolutamente nada foi escrito!!

Deus, o autor, me falou, “Meu estilo de escrita em webnovel é bem diferente do jeito que as pessoas fazem.”

title.en: Heavenly Sword's Grand Saga

altTitles.es-la: La gran saga de Espada Celestial

description.en:
There are people in the world that thinks they are the ‘chosen’ of the heavens.
It’s been decades since chaos and strife among heroes ensued because of those people.
A certain disciple who has six masters has been entrusted with the fate of the central plains.
“If you guys are the heavens, then I’m the sword that’ll pierce the heavens.”
That was what he’d resolved to do… No one mentioned he was a fatty, though!
In any case, now that he’s here, he’ll need to save the… world… Damn it, lose some weight first.

---

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

description.en:
_"You can see me again?"_

One day "Human" was overworked from his black company and about to die... and saw a Grim Reaper! But even though her job is to collect souls, "Grim-chan" instead takes care of "Human" so he doesn't die....?
description.ja:
「ちゃんと休め～～!!」
「また、あたしが見えてるな？」

残業過多で疲れ切ってる「にんげん」はある日、ブラックな労働環境に死にかけて……死神が見えてしまう。
しかし、魂の回収がお仕事なハズの「死神ちゃん」は、「にんげん」が心配のあまり死なないようにお世話をしてしまい――!?

「死神ちゃん」と過ごす、春夏秋冬。疲れ切ってるあなたに贈る、癒やしのフルカラー・ラブコメ・コミック!!

---

"Chanto yasume ~~!!"
 "Mata, atashi ga mie teru na?"

Zangyō kata de tsukare kitteru 'nin gen' wa aru hi, burakkuna rōdō kankyō ni shinikakete... shinigami ga miete shimau. Shikashi, tamashī no kaishū ga oshigotona hazu no 'shinigami-chan' wa,'ni n gen' ga shinpai no amari shinanai yō ni osewa o shite shimai ――!? 

`Shinigami-chan' to sugosu, shunkashūtō. Tsukare kitteru anata ni okuru, iyashi no furukarā rabukome komikku!!
description.pt-br: "Você pode me ver de novo?" Um dia o "Humano" estava sobrecarregado de trabalho de sua empresa abusiva e prestes a morrer... ele viu uma Ceifadora! Mas mesmo que seu trabalho seja coletar almas, "Grim-chan" decide cuidar do "Humano" para que ele não morra...?

description.en:
"283 Production" is a place where idols with striking personalities hang out and gather, a tiny yet lively agency that makes them feel right at home.
Dealing with phone calls, preparing documents, accounting expenses, and so on... With a job different from "producing", office staff are the ones who support idols who shine.
283 Production's office staff, Nanakusa Hazuki. Being a staff, a daughter, and an older sister, the experiences she gathered from her daily life and her feelings shall become the light to help the idols "shine". 
A new "Idolm@ster Shiny Colors" will begin to unfold──from the perspective of an office staff!
description.ja: 「283プロダクション」 個性豊かなアイドルたちが集まる、小さいながら賑やかな「家」のような事務所。 電話対応、書類作成、経費精算などなど…… 「プロデュース」とは別のお仕事で、輝くアイドルたちを支えているのが事務員さんです。 283プロの事務員・七草はづき。 事務員として、娘として、そして姉として 積み重なった日々と想いが、アイドルを“輝かせる”明かりとなる── 事務員視点で綴る、新たな「アイドルマスター シャイニーカラーズ」開幕です！

title.en: I contracted myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

title.en: Shinka Tokusei de Saikyou Necromancer

altTitles.ja: 進化特性で最強ネクロマンサー

altTitles.en: The Strongest Necromancer With Evolutionary Characteristics

description.en:
Makoto Kaneshiro, a former member of the Special Forces, had been spending his days engrossed in video games while struggling to find his place back into society.

Suddenly, he receives an unexpected phone call. "Makoto Kaneshiro, is that you?" The caller possesses detailed knowledge of Makoto's personal information and gaming habits.

Caught off guard, Makoto attempts to shut down his computer, but… to his dismay, he discovers the same situation repeating itself, again and again.

Чтобы исправить искажение истории, Фуджимару, который был перемещен в Синдзюку в 1999 год, встречает одного слугу, который называет себя «Арчер Синдзюку». В городе, где широко распространено зло, открывается занавес истории первого фрагмента!

title.en: Koibami Shoujo

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en:
High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!

title.en: Skeleton Evolution: Starting From Being Summoned By the Sorceress

altTitles.en: Skeleton Evolution: It Starts With Being Summon by a Goddess

altTitles.zh: 骷髅进化：从被女神召唤开始

altTitles.zh-ro: Kulou Jinhua: Cong Bei Nvshen Zhaohuan Kaishi
Kūlóu Jìnhuà: Cóng Bèi Nǚshén Zhàohuàn Kāishǐ

altTitles.es-la: La evolución del esqueleto de otro mundo

description.en:
Jiang Cheng, a man who unexpectedly finds himself reincarnated into a fantastical game world as a lowly skeleton, summoned by a group of beautiful female players using dark necromancy. To his dismay, this skeleton is no ordinary minion; it's the epitome of cannon fodder, barely worth a second glance! But fortune smiles upon him, for he possesses an extraordinary ability—the Infinite Evolution System!

With this newfound power, Jiang Cheng embarks on a remarkable journey, evolving from a mere skeleton into a god-tier undead warrior. Now, armed with unrivaled strength and cunning intellect, he unleashes havoc upon the game world, sending players and NPCs alike into fits of desperation and sorrow.

Follow Jiang Cheng as he rises from the depths of obscurity to become the fearsome legend—the God-tier Skeleton, feared by all, and unmatched in the realms of virtual adventure. Get ready for an epic tale of action, strategy, and unexpected alliances in a world where the line between reality and the virtual becomes blurred. Brace yourself as the laughter of victory and the tears of defeat echo throughout this extraordinary adventure!
description.zh: 江城重生到游戏世界，变成一具被美女玩家用骷髅术召唤的骷髅？这种骷髅，简直比炮灰还炮灰啊！ 还好他有无限进化系统！ 从此，游戏世界多了一具神级骷髅，杀的玩家和NPC哭天喊地。

description.en:
God gave me a chance to relive my life. Before my rebirth, I'd been used for the past 400 years as the empire's sword. And so, I swore to destroy the empire. I found the young prince of the country and became his teacher. I taught him how to become a tyrant and asked for the country.

"I will do as the lady wishes."

He conquered the whole empire for me, and I ran away.

"I came to take you, Charlize Ronan," Dylan had become a perfect tyrant and searched the entire empire for me.

"You tamed me, so why did you run away?"

---
All Charlize Ronan ever wanted was to bring honor to her family. But instead, she is forced into becoming a “living sword” -- a mere tool for the emperors. It is from this hell that she prays for justice… and awakens in her former body. Now, determined to tear down this horrible empire, Charlize seeks out the young prince, Dylan Blade. She will put him on the throne, not as an honorable ruler, but as a tyrant. It is time for Charlize to tame the one who will bring forth her revenge.

---

description.es:
Dios me dio la oportunidad de revivir mi vida. Antes de mi renacimiento, me habían utilizado durante los últimos 400 años como espada del imperio. Y así, juré destruir el imperio. Encontré al joven príncipe del país y me convertí en su maestra. Le enseñé a convertirse en un tirano y le pregunté por el país.

"Haré lo que la dama desee."

Conquistó todo el imperio para mí y me escapé.

"Vine a llevarte, Charlize Ronan." Dylan se había convertido en un perfecto tirano y me buscó por todo el imperio.

"Me domaste, así que ¿por qué te escapaste?"

---

description.ru:
Бог дал мне еще один шанс и наконец я вернулась спустя четыреста лет. Как только я поняла, что вернулась, я решила, что «Никто не должен быть охвачен гордыней». Моей целью было уничтожить страну. Итак, я выросла с гениальным принцем, который жил в подполье и ожидал возможности для возвращения. Он захватил Империю для меня, и я оставила его, чтобы он достиг своей цели.
— Я пришел, чтобы забрать тебя, Шарлиз Ронан.
Через несколько лет поисков по всему континенту Дилан, ставший идеальным тираном, нашел меня.
— Почему ты сбежала?!

---

description.uk:
Кейра – меч імператорів, що несе славу та розквіт Імперії Блейд. Ніхто й подумати не може, що колись цей меч був людиною. 
Шарліз Ронан лише хотіла стати честю своєї сім'ї. Погодившись стати імперським лицарем, вона не знала, на які страждання себе прирекла. Хоч її тіло перетворили на меч, та розум завжди був у свідомості. З самого пекла вона молилася про справедливість.

«Я не проклятий меч! Я – людина!»

Їй дали другий шанс. Шанс на помсту. Шарліз рішуче вирішила знищити Імперію Блейд. Вона посадить на трон Ділана, тринадцятого принца, не як почесного правителя, а як жорсткого тирана. Вона зруйнує імперію навіть ціною власного життя.

«Шарліз, чому ти спочатку підкорила мене, а потім залишила?»

---

title.en: Star of the Overlord

altTitles.en: The Star of a Supreme Ruler

altTitles.es-la: La estrella de un gobernante supremo

description.en:
The mighty crimson star of the supreme ruler has appeared!
The child who receives the energy of this star would grow to become the supreme leader and also become the legendary star that will rule over the world!

Cheon Ryuyeong, someone who grew from a lowly position to the highest position!
“I don’t know… just how much more I’m capable of as well.”
“It’s because I haven’t experienced my own limits before.”

Baek Woonhoe, who tries to become the supreme ruler at all means!
“The only place for me is Murim anyway.”
“Since I’m going to be in Murim, it’s not a bad idea for me to become the supreme ruler.”

Dok Goseol, an unrivaled female martial master who’s both beautiful and strong!
“There’s no rule that the owner of the Supreme Ruler’s Star has to be a man.”
“Therefore, I have a chance at it too.”

Poongwoon, who has a suspicious past and unknown martial art capabilities!
“No one knows.”
“The strength of the martial arts that are hidden in me.”

There can only be one Supreme Ruler!
The intense aspirations and love that take place while fighting for that one position and numerous last minute schemes and betrayals.

Who will become the owner of the Supreme Ruler’s Star?
The story of those people who will bring turbulence into the world is about to start.
description.ko:
강렬하고 붉은 패왕의 별이 떴다!
그 별의 정기를 받고 태어난 아이는 자라나 패왕이 되고
천하(天下)를 지배하게 된다는 전설의 별!

미천한 자리에서 가장 높은 곳에 오르려는 자, 천류영!
“내 그릇의 크기는... 나도 몰라.”
“아직까지 그릇을 채울 만큼 담아본 적이 없거든.”

거침없는 전진으로 패왕을 소유하려는 자, 백운회! 
“어차피 내가 갈 곳은 무림밖에 없다.”
“기왕이면 패왕이 되어 보는 것도 나쁘지는 않겠군.”

아름다움과 강함을 지닌 독보적인 여고수, 독고설! 
“패왕성의 주인이 반드시 남자라는 법은 없지.”
“그러니 나도 가능성이 있어.”

의문어린 과거와 무공의 깊이를 알 수 없는 자, 풍운! 
“아무도 모른다.”
“내 몸 속에 감춰진 강력한 무공을.”

하나의 패왕(覇王)!
하나의 자리를 놓고 벌이는 치열한 야망과 사랑 
그리고 긴박하게 펼쳐지는 수많은 지략과 배신

과연 붉은 패왕성의 주인은 누가 될 것인가?
천하를 격동시키는 그들의 이야기가 
이제 시작된다.

title.en: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later

altTitles.ko: 만 년 만 에 귀환 한 플레이어

description.en:
Oh Kangwoo the Demon King has had it with ruling over Hell and wants to return to Earth. 

But when he finally gets there, not only are his powers sealed, but the Earth he once knew has turned into an MMORPG free-for-all. 

Dimensional gates have appeared all over the world, and "players" enter them to make a living by hunting monsters. If Kangwoo wants to survive in this dangerous game, he's going to have to level up, and fast. 

But for this demon king, hell on earth might be worse than Hell itself!
description.ko:
어느 날, 갑작스럽게 지옥으로 떨어졌다. 
가진 것은 살고 싶다는 갈망과 포식의 권능 뿐.
 
일천의 지옥부터 구천의 지옥까지. 수만, 수십만의 악마를 잡아먹었고. 
마침내 일곱 대공까지 그 앞에 무릎을 꿇었다.
 
"어째서 돌아가려고 하십니까? 
왕께서는 이미 지옥의 모든 것을 가지고 계시지 않습니까."

"가지긴 뭘 다 가져."

먹을 것도, 즐길 것도 없다! 
지옥에 있는 거라고는 황량한 대지와 끔찍한 악마 뿐! 

"난 돌아갈 거야." 

만 년이라는 아득한 시간 만에 그가 지구로 귀환한다.


그러나.. 지구는 자신이 그동안 알던 지구가 아니었다.
description.ru:
Внезапно оказавшись в Аду, всё, что у него осталось это вера и тяга к жизни. Он уничтожал тысячи демонов на всех кругах Преисподней. Даже семь верховных герцогов Ада пали после встречи с ним.

— Владыка, зачем вам обратно на землю? Вся Преисподняя в ваших руках!

— Заткнись и продолжай подготовку к обряду!

Ни вкусной пищи, ни привычных развлечений… лишь ужасающие демоны и безжизненные пустыни.

— Как же хочется вернуться обратно домой…

Спустя 10,000 лет Игрок возвращается на землю.
description.uk:
Раптом опинившись в Пеклі, все, що в нього залишилося це віра і потяг до життя. Він знищував тисячі демонів на всіх колах пекла. Навіть сім верховних герцогів Ада впали після зустрічі з ним.

— Владико, навіщо вам назад на землю? Все пекло у ваших руках!

— Заткнися і продовжуй підготовку до обряду!

Ні смачної їжі, ні звичних розваг… лише жахливі демони та неживі пустелі.

— Як же хочеться повернутися додому…

Через 10.000 років Гравець повертається на землю.
description.pt-br: Um dia, KangWoo de repente foi para o Inferno, apenas com seu forte desejo de sobreviver e com sua Autoridade de Predação. Em todo seu caminho do 1ºinferno até o 9º, ele devorou centenas de milhares de demônios, até que os Sete Arquiduques finalmente se ajoelhassem diante dele. “Por que deseja voltar? Você já não possuí tudo aqui no Inferno, meu lorde?” “O que tenho exatamente?” Não tinha nada para comer, nem sequer um entretenimento! Ilhas desoladas e demônios medonhos preenchiam todo o Inferno. “Vou voltar.” Depois de dez mil anos no 9ºInferno, ele retornou à Terra.

title.en: The Divine Twilight's Return

altTitles.es-la: El Retorno De La Constelación Rota

description.en:
After being put on trial, the deity once known as The Divine Twilight is offered a job by Thanatos, king of the underworld! Now, the fallen deity is back on Earth as his former self, Lee Changsun, and is tasked with sealing those trying to invade from beyond. With the promise of a fresh start, Changsun is gathering the gear and skills needed to get the job done, but he's feeling some watchful eyes on him...

Will this Divine Twilight see a new day, or is the sun setting on his second chance?
description.ko:
한낱 인간에서 신의 위치까지 오른 '신들의 황혼'
흉신으로 위명을 떨치다 신좌, 신앙, 신위…… 모든 걸 잃었다.
신성도 끊어졌고, 신력도 사라졌다.

“짐과 같이 일을 좀 해 주었으면 한다.”

그런 그에게 명계의 주인, 타나토스가 손을 내미는데……
그 손을 잡은 '신들의 황혼'은 이제 플레이어 '이창선'으로 다시 살기 시작한다.
자신을 나락으로 떨어트린 신들의 목을 쥐기 위해!

‘돌아왔구나, 정말로.’

title.en: Atavistic Super Evolution

description.en: The falling of a mysterious seed plunged the entire Earth into an era where all living beings had the qualifications to compete for the top of the food chain. Commander Yue Li, the leader of a special forces team, lost the most important person in his life during the catastrophe. After battling monsters for three years, he himself became a member of the monsters due to an accident. With his dual identity, can he become the apex predator in this disaster?

title.en: Seven Sleeping Beauties

altTitles.ja: 7人の眠り姫

altTitles.ja-ro: 7-Nin no Nemuri Hime
Shichinin no Nemurihime

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

description.en:
Shunpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! 
Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.

It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!

---
- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！

title.en: Omega Tribe

altTitles.ja: オメガトライブ

description.en: It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

title.en: Cromartie High School

altTitles.ja: 魁!!クロマティ高校

altTitles.ja-ro: Sakigake!! Cromartie Koukou

description.en:
Welcome to Cromartie High—a melting pot of underachievers and overzealous bullies, where the fist rules, and the student body has the combined I.Q. of a rusty nail. After a whole lot of bad judgment and a little bad luck, Takashi Kamiyama is now attending this academy of dunces. Here, his only homework will be defending himself against the foul-mouthed robots, semi-intelligent apes, and masked villains that roam the halls of Cromartie High School!  

Parody of various Bancho manga, with the mangaka also making use of Ryoichi Ikegami's style.  

A live-action movie was made.

---
- **Won the 26th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2002, which it shared with Beck**

title.en: Kusunoki-san wa Koukou Debut ni Shippai shite Iru

altTitles.ja: 楠木さんは高校デビューに失敗している

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusunoki-san wa Koukou Debut ni Shippai shite Iru

altTitles.zh: 楠木同学高中出道失败了

altTitles.en: Kusunoki-san Failed to Debut in High School
She Is (Not) a Cool Girl (in High School)
Kusunoki-san Failed Her High School Debut

altTitles.ru: Кусуноки-сан не смогла измениться к старшей школе

altTitles.zh-ro: Nánmù tóngxué gāo zhòng chūdào shībàile

description.en: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past...except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!
description.ja:
中学時代のトラウマをきっかけに高校デビューに成功した元陰キャの志月恵助。
新しい環境で過去の自分を知る者はいない。ただ一人、同じ中学出身で
恵助と同様に高校デビューを果たした女子・楠木静を除いて…。

---
Chūgaku jidai no torauma o kikkake ni kōkō debyū ni seikō shita moto in kya no shitsuki keisuke. Atarashī kankyō de kako no jibun o shiru mono wa inai. Tadahitori, onaji chūgaku shusshin de keisuke to dōyō ni kōkō debyū o hatashita joshi Kusunoki Shizuka o nozoite….

title.en: The God of Destruction Who Gets Cuter and Lewder the More She Goes Viral

altTitles.ja: バズった分だけ可愛くてえっちになる 破壊神

altTitles.ja-ro: Bazuttabun Dake Kawaikute Ecchi ni Naru Hakai-shin

altTitles.es-la: Mientras mas interacciones tenga, mas lindo y travieso se volverá el dios de la destrucción

title.en: Captain Tsubasa - Road to 2002

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

title.en: I Just Want to Game in Peace

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Zhǐ Xiǎng Ānjìng De Dǎ Yóuxì

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Play Games Quietly
I Just Want to Play the Game Quietly

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Zhi Xiang Anjing De Da Youxi

description.en: Dimensional storms have descended and many extradimensional areas have appeared on Earth. All kinds of mysterious extradimensional lives are born in these extradimensional areas. In order to become strong, humans started to enter these dangerous areas to hunt and kill extradimensional creatures. But I, Zhou Wen, have made these extradimensional areas into instance dungeons in my mobile game. By levelling up my game character, I will be levelling up my strength in reality. When others are risking their lives, I’m here getting stronger by gaming.

title.en: Tsurenai Kanojo no Hitorijime

altTitles.ja: つれない彼女のひとりじめ

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsurenai Kanojo no Hitorijime

description.en: A story of youth and sensuality. A thrilling real high school love story! High schooler Nachi Shinohara is a social butterfly. He can get along with anyone. On the other hand, there's the lone wolf, Takizawa Yuuri. A chance exchange of words leads to a relationship that no one knows about.
description.ja:
ぼくらが味わう、青い官能

ノリが良くてクラスの人気者の篠原成智と、一匹狼の美少女・滝沢優凛。
教室の端と端くらい遠かったふたりだけど、ふとしたきっかけで言葉を交わしたことから、誰にも秘密で付き合うことに…！！　

好きだからひとりじめしたい！
とにかく甘くて、少しだけ刺激的な、リアル高校生ラブストーリー！
description.pt-br: Shinohara Nachi, é um cara popular do ensino médio que se dá bem com qualquer uma, mas se sentiu atraído por Takizawa Yuuri, uma linda garota solitária. Uma troca casual de palavras leva a um relacionamento que ninguém mais conhece.

title.en: Ane no Tomodachi

altTitles.ja: 姉のともだち

altTitles.en: The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in [Pre-Seralization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll Do Anything to Become a Librarian~ Part 2 "I'll Become a Shrine Maiden for Books!"
Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll Do Anything to Become a Librarian~ Part 2 "I'll Even Join the Temple to Read Books!"

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou: Part 2

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～ 第二部 「本のためなら巫女になる！」

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」

description.en:
After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!

title.en: The Big Bees

altTitles.ja: デカいはちの話

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

title.en: Haiiro no Onmyouji

altTitles.ja: 灰色の陰陽師

description.en: Sabatora, a boy whose parents were killed by Kuragari, works as an Onmyoji for the Public Security Bureau to get revenge. His only comfort is Kyue, a Kuragari who lives with him. Kyue, who has lived with Sabatora since he was a small child, is a kind and gentle soul who is like an irreplaceable member of Sabatora's family. One day, however, Kyue is attacked by Seto, a colleague from the Public Security Bureau who hates Kuragari. In a pinch, Sabatora and Kyue undergo an unexpected transformation.(natalie.mu)
description.ja:
人間を食い殺し世を脅かす【暮明】。公安の陰陽寮に所属する陰陽師の鯖虎は、丑三つ時になると暮明を退治する生活を送っていた。

そんな鯖虎には1つの秘密が…。両親を失い唯一の家族【きゅえ(暮明)】を隠れ家で匿っているのだった。

だが上司の陰陽師に秘密がバレてしまったことで生活は一変!! 暮明に与する者は外敵と見なされ…!? 指名手配されてしまった鯖虎! 反逆のダークヒーロー譚ここに開幕!!

title.en: My Food Looks Very Cute

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

title.en: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.ja: センパイ！わざとじゃないんです！

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai! Wazato Janain desu!
Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.en: Senpai! I Didn't Do It on Purpose!

description.en:
Sachi, a high school student, is confessed to by her love Jun, a senior who is a year older than her, and they are finally going out! However, as soon as she realizes that she is in love with Jun, Sachi has a constitution that causes her to have accidental pervert incidents with him every chance she gets! When Sachi tries to hold his hand for the first time, she accidentally puts her hand down his pants and she ends up deeply misunderstanding Jun when he asks her to pull out her hand. 

It's a sexy cute☆romantic comedy!
description.ja: 女子高生・幸は一学年上の憧れの先輩・純に告白されて、晴れて付き合えることに！ ところが両思いになった途端、幸は純に対して事あるごとにラッキースケベを起こしてしまう体質になってしまい…！? はじめて手を握ろうとしたら、勢いあまって彼のズボンに手を突っ込んでしまい違うものを握ってしまったり、あまつさえ手を抜こうとしたら手で抜こうとしてしまったりする、そんな一組のカップルが織りなすエロカワ☆ラブコメディです。
description.ru: Старшеклассница Сати наконец начинает встречаться с Дзюном, парнем который старше её на год. Она первая призналась, а теперь каждый раз, когда её переполняют чувства любви, богатые формы так и норовят создать неловкую ситуацию! Первая попытка Сати взяться за руки, случайно превращается в нырок в штаны Дзюна, оставляя его в полном недоумении. Встречайте эро-кавай ☆ лавком мангу!
